description: The iPhone is a smartphone made by Apple that combines a computer, iPod, digital camera and cellular phone into one device with a touchscreen interface.

a watch that displays the time in numerical digits rather than by hands on a dial
The iPad is a tablet computer developed by Apple. It is smaller than a typical laptop, but significantly larger than the average smartphone.
